application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: G.1 Cherry, Lawson cypress x3 yew saplings and bay suckers - Fell (TCA)G.2 Cherry laurel - Prune back the stems contacting the fence by 3 metres (exempt).T.1 Crab apple - Fell (dead- exempt).T.2 Bay coppice - Reduce the height by 3 metres (exempt).T.3 Bay suckers - Fell (exempt).T.4 Bay - Reduce the overextended limb over the lawn 2.5 metres (exempt).T.5 London plane - Reshape 3 overextended laterals into the main crown on the S-S.E side by 2.5m to suitable growth points.
